title: Instagram Accounts Manager
job_overview:
About:

- You will be managing multiple Instagram Accounts
- You will be consistently posting and engaging on the platform
- You will need the ability to keep consistent
- You will need excellent organisational skills
- You will need excellent time-management skills

----------

Pay & Benefits:

- $200/month
----------

Company Vibe:

- Weekly check-ins to stay connected
- Experienced managers to guide you through updates and news

----------

Schedule:

- We do NOT have shifts
- Work is based on completing daily tasks

----------

Hiring Steps:

(1) Submit your application: Upgrade to see actual info
(2) First Round Interview
(3) Training
(4) Induction
(5) Hired
